description: As a former Filemaker user, for me this is like a toy. You can setup a file and start to put information in records, but you can almost do nothing with the records in a file, only search them. I could not even print to an installed printer, only to pdf.
Very good basic DBase. Fast and easy to understand.

Intuitive interface, ideal for creating collections of pretty much anything. Fully customisable forms, ideal for use as a personal artwork archive as I can add all the fields required, Title, Medium etc. and add images too. Saving records to PDF is a useful feature, allowing me to quickly share available artworks with clients and galleries.

The ability to browse records by thumbnail only would be a great addition, otherwise a solid tool for creating a searchable database, ideal for the user who wants to keep things simple.
summary: Intuitive and customisable, great for archiving artwork,

description: There are so many things you can do with this database, and it is so easy to use. Great for pdf's, images, making forms ( drop and drag interface ), and has cloud backup. I got up to 700,000 rows with 52 columns with no problem. I hope this project goes even farther. Upload in .csv files, and export.

The quality of this application is very high. People familiar with FileMaker may try to compare this to it, but really they are targeting very different groups. This application is much more like Apple's Bento. It is great for organizing things. It handles, photos, urls, files, and dates very intuitively. The ability to sync with dropbox really sold me. I consume different media, and was looking for a way to track it. This works so well. You could use it for all kinds of stuff. I like it very much. Thank you developers!

Something must have gone wrong during installation. Re-install did not work. And NOWHERE can I find any support.
I hope I can find a solution before I will remove Symphytum.
summary: Does not start. Just takes up space

description:
I had to download the .deb from github because the app won't launch.
It's a good app, and covers basics, which is good. But, I would like it gets updated and upgraded more often, the last time the app was upgraded was back in 2020.

With upgrades I mean more feautures, like be able to use the app as front end for a database like MySQL, MariaDB or PostgreSQL. That would be amazing and I would be happy to pay for it.

Thank you
summary: great app, though it needs updates and upgrades

description:
Schönes schlankes Datenbankprogramm.
Schade nur das man im Ausdruck den Satz " erstellt mit......"
nicht ändern oder abschalten kann

Datumserinnerungen funktionieren nicht, Synchronisation meldet alles synchronisiert und Prüfung ergibt: Nichts ist synchronisiert. Der Ansatz und das einfache Händling sind gut, aber relevante Daten würde ich dem Progrämmchen nicht anvertrauen.

summary: Gran contribucion, la uso en mi trabajo, recomiendo
